titles.title: Recognizing the myriad contributions of female ambassadors and members of the Foreign Service to help build a more free, prosperous, and secure world.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Recognizes the contributions of female ambassadors and members of the Foreign Service to help build a more free, prosperous, and secure world.
